Class UIMenuWithExtraView

Views.UIMenuWithExtraView

IUIDisplay
Direct Known Subclasses:
StaffBaseView
public class UIMenuWithExtraView extends UIMenuView
UIMenuView which supports extra views passed by an object (for dynamic views)
